query: create or replace view `dfs`.`AAR  Views`.CUSTOM_delta_business_criteria_grade as SELECT  `bc`.`snapshot`,  `bc`.`snapshot_date`,  `bc`.`snapshot_time`,  `bc`.`snapshot_order`,  `bc`.`snapshot_td`,  `bc`.`appname`,  `bc`.`appResults`['reference']['name'] AS `bcName`,  CASE  WHEN `bc`.`appResults`['reference']['shortName'] IS NULL THEN 'TQI'  ELSE `bc`.`appResults`['reference']['shortName'] END AS `bcShortName`,  `bc`.`appResults`['result']['grade'] AS `bc_grade` FROM (SELECT  `bcj`.`number` AS `snapshot`,  `bcj`.`date`['isoDate'] AS `snapshot_date`,  `bcj`.`date`['time'] AS `snapshot_time`,  DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY `bcj`.`application`['name'] ORDER BY `bcj`.`number` DESC) AS `snapshot_order`,  `bcj`.`date`['time'] AS `snapshot_td`,  `bcj`.`application`['name'] AS `appname`,  `FLATTEN`(`bcj`.`applicationResults`) AS `appResults` FROM `dfs`.`AAR  Inputs`.`./CLIENT-BusinessCriteria.json` AS `bcj`) AS `bc` WHERE `bc`.`snapshot_order` < 3
